extension.docketText: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL as to defendant Fernando Delarosa - the Federal Public Defender is appointed to represent the defendant signed by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken on 7/6/2006. (MBB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Delarosa
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER by Judge Lyle E. Strom as to defendant Fernando Delarosa scheduling Rule 11 hearing for September 29, 2006, at 9:30 a.m. Time between August 28, 2006, and September 29, 2006, shall be demed excludable under the requirement of the Speedy Trial Act. (JDR)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER by Judge Lyle E. Strom as to defendant Fernando Delarosa scheduling Rule 11 hearing for September 29, 2006, at 9:30 a.m. Time between August 28, 2006, and September 29, 2006, shall be demed excludable under the requirement of the Speedy Trial Act. (JDR)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Delarosa
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 24 Motion to Review Conditions of Release and Request for Evidentiary Hearing as to defendant Fernando Delarosa. Pretrial Services is to investigate the proffered plan and provide a report to the court with copies to counsel. An evidentiary hearing on the motion is scheduled before Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken at 9:30 a.m. on 09/27/2006. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken. (MBB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER granting 24 Motion to Review Conditions of Release and Request for Evidentiary Hearing as to defendant Fernando Delarosa. Pretrial Services is to investigate the proffered plan and provide a report to the court with copies to counsel. An evidentiary hearing on the motion is scheduled before Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken at 9:30 a.m. on 09/27/2006. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken. (MBB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Delarosa
titleInfo.subTitle: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITUREsustaining 32 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture as to Fernando Delarosa (1). The ATF is authorized to seize a 9mm semi-automatic handgun, model P9RZ, serial number RZ00337; a Remington Model 522 Viper.22 caliber rifle, serial number3080913; a Stevens, Model 59A.410 shotgun with no serial number; and a Mohawk 10 C.22 caliber rifle, serial number 2533594. Defendant's interest in said properties is forfeited to the USA. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture. Ordered by Judge Lyle E. Strom. Certified copy to the USM.(JSF)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITUREsustaining 32 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture as to Fernando Delarosa (1). The ATF is authorized to seize a 9mm semi-automatic handgun, model P9RZ, serial number RZ00337; a Remington Model 522 Viper.22 caliber rifle, serial number3080913; a Stevens, Model 59A.410 shotgun with no serial number; and a Mohawk 10 C.22 caliber rifle, serial number 2533594. Defendant's interest in said properties is forfeited to the USA. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture. Ordered by Judge Lyle E. Strom. Certified copy to the USM.(JSF)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Delarosa
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Fernando Delarosa (1), Defendant plead guilty to Counts I, II, IV, VI and VIII of the Superseding Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 33 months; 3 years supervised release with special conditions; $100 special assessment; the defendant shall surrender for service at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons before 2:00 p.m. on January 29, 2007; Counts I and II of the Indictment and Counts III, V and VII of the Superseding Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only; the defendant shall forfeit the defendant's interest in the following property to the United States: 9mm semi-automatic handgun, model P9RZ, serial number RZ00337; Remington Model 522 Viper.22 caliber rifle, serial number 3080913; Stevens, Model 59A.410 shotgun with no serial number; Mohawk 10 C.22 caliber rifle, serial number 2533594, Criminal Case Terminated as to defendant Fernando Delarosa Ordered by Judge Lyle E. Strom. (4 certified copies to USM) (CJP)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: JUDGMENT as to Fernando Delarosa (1), Defendant plead guilty to Counts I, II, IV, VI and VIII of the Superseding Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 33 months; 3 years supervised release with special conditions; $100 special assessment; the defendant shall surrender for service at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons before 2:00 p.m. on January 29, 2007; Counts I and II of the Indictment and Counts III, V and VII of the Superseding Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only; the defendant shall forfeit the defendant's interest in the following property to the United States: 9mm semi-automatic handgun, model P9RZ, serial number RZ00337; Remington Model 522 Viper.22 caliber rifle, serial number 3080913; Stevens, Model 59A.410 shotgun with no serial number; Mohawk 10 C.22 caliber rifle, serial number 2533594, Criminal Case Terminated as to defendant Fernando Delarosa Ordered by Judge Lyle E. Strom. (4 certified copies to USM) (CJP)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Delarosa
titleInfo.subTitle: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE- The Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture is hereby sustained 42. All right, title and interest in and to the subject properties, i.e, a 9mm semi-automatic handgun, Model P9RZ, serial number RZ00337, a Remington Model 522 Viper.22 caliber rifle, serial number 3080913, a Stevens Model 59A.410 shotgun with no serial number, and a Mohawk 10 C.22 caliber rifle, serial number 2533594 are hereby forever barred, foreclosed and forfeited to the United States of America; The United States Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms is directed to dispose of said properties in accordance with law as to defendant Fernando Delarosa Ordered by Judge Lyle E. Strom.(MKR ) 1 cert to USM

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE- The Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture is hereby sustained 42. All right, title and interest in and to the subject properties, i.e, a 9mm semi-automatic handgun, Model P9RZ, serial number RZ00337, a Remington Model 522 Viper.22 caliber rifle, serial number 3080913, a Stevens Model 59A.410 shotgun with no serial number, and a Mohawk 10 C.22 caliber rifle, serial number 2533594 are hereby forever barred, foreclosed and forfeited to the United States of America; The United States Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms is directed to dispose of said properties in accordance with law as to defendant Fernando Delarosa Ordered by Judge Lyle E. Strom.(MKR ) 1 cert to USM
